Some pple were asking why I haven't tweeted for some time-so I will after letting dust in the air(in our region) settle down a little bit !
After reading an art.in the NewTimes yes'day by Sunny. N I can't agree more that blaming Rw.for anything has come to serve as diversionary..
..&pretext fr many things;- domestic politics of some western countries&historical responsibility as of old in messing up Africa..,
..Personal agendas or representation of places they come from by some in the media,so-called h/rights &other unaccountable grps imposing...
..Their will esp on less devlped&/or weak nations. Rw has been thrust into this l/light by our tragic history(fr which sme of thse outside.
..accusers are the actual architects)! The other reason being that we have sought to manage our problems our (right) way avoiding dictates
Talk about democracy&all kinds of freedom-rightly so. Yet the same pple are the ones denying others their freedoms by deciding fr them..
..under assumption that they(&only) know better what is good for every1 in these areas.They must chose who n what is good fr us- not so..
Others funny enough suggest the West v Rw or vice versa- makes no sense,we r agnst&resist what is agnst us&Africa! We r pro many things west
We have introduced the Vulnerable Kids’ Information system so agencies can better protect NZ children, http://t.co/VYN0rWvY
These few things we are accused of(smtms fabricated,misinterpreted or exaggerated..)happen on far worse scale in their courtyard by them..
..they have other names for them or are totally silent abt them&dont let them be the ones to define who they are as they do fr us..!
Rwandans-we want to confront n solve our problems,we don't want to be victims n we will succEed,we r making gd progress!
We will not be deterred by any1,or any means,falsehoods..used against us! We will forge ahead with those who mean well &give their support!!
More..another time!
Have a good night..!

Good day, good world! I inform: I have appointed the new Minister of Interior and Justice, General Néstor Reverol! Efficiency!!!
I keep informing: I have appointed journalist Ernesto Villegas as the new Minister of Communication and Information !! Efficiency!!!!
I continue: for Almiranta Carmen Meléndez, for the Office of the Presidency and Follow-up of Government Management. Efficiency!!!
For the Ministry of Agriculture and Lands, return Juan Carlos Loyo! Efficiency or Nothing !!!!
We continue this rainy noon: for Indigenous Peoples, I designate to the Compatriot Aloha Núñez! Homeland for the Indians! Efficiency!
And for the Ministry of the Environment, the Compatriot Cristóbal Francisco! Efficiency or Nothing !!!!
